detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found:
	Contract BuyerToken () has payable functions:
	 - BuyerToken.buy() ()
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found:

	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

detectors.description:
owned.transferOwnership(address) () should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner ()
detectors.markdown:
[owned.transferOwnership(address)]() should emit an event for: 
	- [owner = newOwner]()

detectors.description:
BuyerToken.setPrices(uint256) () should emit an event for: 
	- buyPrice = newBuyPrice ()
detectors.markdown:
[BuyerToken.setPrices(uint256)]() should emit an event for:

detectors.description:
